title: 90/177/Euratom, EEC: Commission Decision of 23 March 1990 authorizing Belgium not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 March 1990
authorizing Belgium not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base
(Only the Dutch and French texts are authentic)
(90/177/Euratom, EEC)

main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:

For the Commission
